title: Value Is Plain Object
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of checking whether a given value is a plain object or not using JavaScript. We will use the isPlainObject() function to check if the provided value is an object created by the Object constructor. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to determine if an object is plain or not in JavaScript.

meta.title: Exploring Plain Objects in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to determine if a value is a plain object using the isPlainObject() function in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, object, programming tutorial, javascript lab, isplainobject, javascript tutor, plain object

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 值是否为普通对象
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探讨如何使用JavaScript检查给定值是否为普通对象的概念。我们将使用isPlainObject()函数来检查提供的值是否是由Object构造函数创建的对象。在本实验结束时，你将更好地理解如何在JavaScript中确定一个对象是否为普通对象。

meta.title: 探索JavaScript中的普通对象
meta.description: 学习如何使用JavaScript中的isPlainObject()函数确定一个值是否为普通对象。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, 在线JavaScript练习, 对象, 编程教程, JavaScript实验, isplainobject, JavaScript导师, 普通对象

verify.name: 在Zsh历史记录中验证Node命令
